about_description: I'm currently in my final year of BUT Informatique in Clermont Ferrand, and I'm continuing next year with a Master's degree at ESGI. I'm passionate about development, especially mobile development. Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

first.title: Software developer | Accenture/Michelin | Clermont-Ferrand
first.description: Work-study program at accenture, on assignment at Michelin

mission.first: Search for AI-based unit test generation solutions

second.title: Trainee developer | Accenture/Michelin | Clermont-Ferrand
second.description: Internship at Accenture, on assignment at Michelin

mission.first: Data migration between two reference systems
mission.second: Implementing new functionalities in an existing Angular/Springboot application

third.title: Half head waiter | Rivage Hôtel | Annecy

mission.first: Room service, customer reception, runner, teamwork

first.title: Trek12
first.description: Trek12 is an adaptation of the Trek12 board game into a cross-platform mobile application. I worked on this project with a team of 4 people. I learned a lot about mobile application development and api.

second.title: Cypres
second.description: Cyprès is a cross-platform mobile application for sharing content with friends. Centered around a messaging system, it gives you access to different applications for sharing things with your loved ones. This application was created by 2.

third.title: Dou Shou Qi
third.description: Dou Shou Qi is an adaptation of the Chinese board game Dou Shou Qi into a mobile application. I worked on this project as part of the Swift course in my 3rd year at BUT.
